_source.text: 8 He is to be called George; & I believe I have pleasant associations with that name from formerly playing with your Boy.- 9 I hope M rs Henslow is better.

text: 8 He is to be called **George**; & I believe I have pleasant associations with that name from formerly playing with your **Boy**.- 9 I hope M rs Henslow **is** **better**.
